item.title: The question of Cubans this December: 'what will we eat and drink by the end of the year?'
item.description: Cubanos en calle de la Habana(Diario de Cuba) “Everything is very expensive. I left the airport and on Ocho Vías, I was hungry, I stopped to eat something, one of these boxes that used to sell between 25, 30 or 50 pesos … Well, the boxes are now about 270 pesos, almost 300 and they are two tablespoons of congrí, a rotten sweet potato and a rotten meat.
